author: .paulharris
content: If we can get all (CL) teams to have a look over this, it's a validator required api that we might be introducing a v2 of

author: radekkapka
content: Is it possible to view `Example Value` for different schema versions when we have a `oneOf`? An example would be https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=dev#/Beacon/publishBlock, where the example value is a Phase0 block. It would be nice if I could see an example for every version, so that I can use it when testing.

author: radekkapka
content: this might get ugly for blobs though because of their size...
